00046 RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer::ModifyServer(FXApp *a, FXString serverName)
00047   :FXDialogBox(a, "Add a new server", DECOR_TITLE|DECOR_BORDER|DECOR_RESIZE)
00048 {
00049 
00050   this->serverName=serverName;
00051   std::string name(serverName.text());
00052 
00053   // Get the server's client informations
00054   xmlServerList xsl;
00055   tServerListItem* sli=xsl.getServerByName(name.c_str());
00056   unsigned int maxCli=sli->maxClients;
00057   unsigned int actCli=sli->actClients;
00058 
00059   // The root frame
00060   FXVerticalFrame *root =new FXVerticalFrame(this,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00061 
00062   std::string lab1="Here you can change the number of connected\n"
00063     "clients of the selected server.\n"
00064     "The server has actually ";
00065   lab1+=StringConv::getSingleton().itoc(sli->actClients);
00066   lab1+="/";
00067   lab1+=StringConv::getSingleton().itoc(sli->maxClients);
00068   lab1+=" clients.";
00069 
00070 
00071   FXLabel* labHelp=new FXLabel(root, lab1.c_str(), 0, 
00072                                LABEL_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00073 
00074   // The Spinner
00075   FXSpinner* spiCli=new FXSpinner(root, 2, this, ID_SPI_CLI, 
00076                                   LAYOUT_FILL_X|SPIN_NORMAL);
00077   spiCli->setRange(0, maxCli);
00078   spiCli->setValue(actCli);
00079 
00080   // The buttons
00081   FXHorizontalFrame *btnFrame = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00082   FXuint btnOpts= LAYOUT_RIGHT|BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH ;
00083   FXint btnWidth=120;
00084   FXButton* btn1=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Cancel", NULL, this, 
00085                                ID_BTN_CANCEL, btnOpts, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00086   btn1->setDefault(true);
00087   FXButton* btn2=new FXButton( btnFrame, "OK", NULL, this, ID_BTN_OK, 
00088                                BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00089 
00090 
00091 }

00122 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer::
00123 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00124   LOGW("Not yet implemented");

00140 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer::
00141 onOkClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00142   LOGI("OK button clicked");
00143 
00144   std::string name(serverName.text());
00145 
00146   CurlServerModifClients csmc;
00147   csmc.setName(name);
00148   csmc.setActClients(actClients);
00149 
00150   bool per=csmc.perform();
00151 
00152   if (per){
00153     LOGI("The form was correctly posted");
00154   }
00155   else{
00156     HttpResponse hr;
00157     long resp=csmc.getServerResponse();
00158     const char* mes=hr.getMessage(resp);
00159     LOGCATS("HTTP rsponse :");
00160     LOGCATS(mes);
00161   }
00162 
00163   handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_ACCEPT), NULL);
00164 
00165 
00166   return 1;
00167 }

00180 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer::
00181 onCancelClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00182   LOGI("Cancel button clicked");
00183   handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_CANCEL), NULL);
00184   return 1;

00196 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer::
00197 onSpinnerClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00198 
00199   int i=(int)v;
00200   LOGCATS("New value ");
00201   LOGCATI(i);
00202   LOGCAT();
00203   actClients=i;
00204 }
